skills.name: S—S—S—Scared
skills.desc: The Treasure Trotter got spooked and will flee in 2 turns.

skills.name: Run... Run!
skills.desc: The Treasure Trotter is panicking and will flee in 1 turn.

skills.name: Phew... Escaped
skills.desc: The Trotter flees in an instant.

skills.name: C—Cure You
skills.desc: When a friendly unit other than the Trotter of Abundance is attacked, consumes HP to heal the attacked friendly unit.
